ComicInfo.Summary:
Previews Presents the "Queens of Halloween". This was a promotional mini comic published & distributed by Diamond Comic Distibutors to promote their Previews Catalog. (Chaos Comics) "Where Darkness Dwells" by Brian Pulido & Jstiniano with appearances by Lady Death, Evil Ernie, Purgatori, Chastity, Cremator. (Top Cow Comics) Witchblade appears in an untitled Halloween themed story. (Harris Comics) Vampirella Blood Lust by James Robinson & Joe Jusko.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/queens-of-halloween-1-where-darkness-dwells/4000-124654/
ComicInfo.Title: Where Darkness Dwells!
